embeds.title: üé¨ How to Request Media
embeds.description: Use the commands below to request movies and TV shows. Your requests will be automatically processed and added to our Plex library!

fields.name: üì∫ Request Commands
fields.value:
**`/request sd-hd-movie title`** - Request a movie by title
**`/request sd-hd-tv title`** - Request a TV show by title

Simply type the command and enter the movie or show name!

fields.name: üìã Request Process
fields.value:
**1.** Submit your request using one of the commands above
**2.** The request will begin downloading automatically
**3.** You'll receive a ping in <#request-status> when it's ready
**4.** Once Plex picks it up, you'll see it in <#recently-added>
**5.** Start watching on Plex!

fields.name: ‚è±Ô∏è How Long Does It Take?
fields.value: Download times vary based on file size and server load. Most content is available within a few hours. Check <#request-status> for updates on your specific request.

fields.name: üí° Tips
fields.value:
‚Ä¢ Be specific with titles to get accurate results
‚Ä¢ For TV shows, you'll be prompted to select which season(s) you want
‚Ä¢ Already requested something? Check <#request-status> first
‚Ä¢ Can't find what you're looking for? Ask in <#general-chat>

fields.name: ‚ö†Ô∏è Please Be Respectful
fields.value: Storage is expensive! Please be mindful of what you request. Only request content you actually plan to watch, and consider if it's already available before requesting multiple seasons.

fields.name: ‚ùì Need Help?
fields.value: If you have issues with requests or need assistance, ask in <#general-chat> or check <#setup-tips> for common solutions.
